71 ADCBuf_Handle MmwDemo_ADCBufOpen(void)
72 {
73  ADCBuf_Params ADCBufparams;
74  ADCBuf_Handle ADCBufHandle = NULL;
75 
76  /* Initialize the ADCBUF */
77  ADCBuf_init();
78 
79  /*****************************************************************************
80  * Start ADCBUF driver:
81  *****************************************************************************/
82  /* ADCBUF Params initialize */
83  ADCBuf_Params_init(&ADCBufparams);
84  ADCBufparams.chirpThresholdPing = 1;
85  ADCBufparams.chirpThresholdPong = 1;
86  ADCBufparams.continousMode = 0;
87 
88  /* Open ADCBUF driver */
89  ADCBufHandle = ADCBuf_open(0, &ADCBufparams);
90 
91  return ADCBufHandle;
92 }
93 
113 int32_t MmwDemo_ADCBufConfig
114 (
115  ADCBuf_Handle adcBufHandle,
116  uint16_t rxChannelEn,
117  uint8_t chirpThreshold,
118  uint32_t chanDataSize,
119  MmwDemo_ADCBufCfg *adcBufCfg,
120  uint16_t *rxChanOffset
121 )
122 {
123  ADCBuf_dataFormat dataFormat;
124  ADCBuf_RxChanConf rxChanConf;
125  int32_t retVal = 0U;
126  uint8_t channel;
127  uint32_t rxChanMask = 0xF;
128  int32_t rxChanOffsetIndx = 0;
129 
130  /*****************************************************************************
131  * Data path :: ADCBUF driver Configuration
132  *****************************************************************************/
133  /* Populate data format from configuration */
134  dataFormat.adcOutFormat = adcBufCfg->adcFmt;
135  dataFormat.channelInterleave = adcBufCfg->chInterleave;
136  dataFormat.sampleInterleave = adcBufCfg->iqSwapSel;
137 
138  /* Disable all ADCBuf channels */
139  if ((retVal = ADCBuf_control(adcBufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CHANNEL_DISABLE, (void *)&rxChanMask)) < 0)
140  {
141 #ifdef MMWDEMO_CONFIGADCBUF_DBG
142  System_printf("Error: Disable ADCBuf channels failed with [Error=%d]\n", retVal);
143 #endif
144  goto exit;
145  }
146 
147  retVal = ADCBuf_control(adcBufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CONF_DATA_FORMAT, (void *)&dataFormat);
148  if (retVal < 0)
149  {
150  goto exit;
151  }
152 
153  memset((void*)&rxChanConf, 0, sizeof(ADCBuf_RxChanConf));
154 
155  /* Enable Rx Channels */
156  for (channel = 0; channel < SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL; channel++)
157  {
158  if(rxChannelEn & (0x1U << channel))
159  {
160  /* Populate the receive channel configuration: */
161  rxChanConf.channel = channel;
162  retVal = ADCBuf_control(adcBufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CHANNEL_ENABLE, (void *)&rxChanConf);
163  if (retVal < 0)
164  {
165 #ifdef MMWDEMO_CONFIGADCBUF_DBG
166  System_printf("Error: MMWDemoDSS ADCBuf Control for Channel %d Failed with error[%d]\n", channel, retVal);
167 #endif
168  goto exit;
169  }
170  /* Offset starts from 0 for the first channel */
171  rxChanOffset[rxChanOffsetIndx++] = rxChanConf.offset;
172 
173  /* Calculate offset for the next channel */
174  rxChanConf.offset += chanDataSize * chirpThreshold;
175  }
176  }
177 
178 #if (defined SOC_XWR16XX) || (defined SOC_XWR18XX) || (defined SOC_XWR68XX)
179  /* Set ping/pong chirp threshold: */
180  retVal = ADCBuf_control(adcBufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_PING_CHIRP_THRESHHOLD,
181  (void *)&chirpThreshold);
182  if(retVal < 0)
183  {
184 #ifdef MMWDEMO_CONFIGADCBUF_DBG
185  System_printf("Error: ADCbuf Ping Chirp Threshold Failed with Error[%d]\n", retVal);
186 #endif
187  goto exit;
188  }
189  retVal = ADCBuf_control(adcBufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_PONG_CHIRP_THRESHHOLD,
190  (void *)&chirpThreshold);
191  if(retVal < 0)
192  {
193 #ifdef MMWDEMO_CONFIGADCBUF_DBG
194  System_printf("Error: ADCbuf Pong Chirp Threshold Failed with Error[%d]\n", retVal);
195 #endif
196  goto exit;
197  }
198 #endif
199 
200 #ifdef SOC_XWR14XX
201  /* Set ping/pong chirp threshold: */
202  retVal = ADCBuf_control(adcBufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_CHIRP_THRESHHOLD,
203  (void *)&chirpThreshold);
204  if(retVal < 0)
205  {
206 #ifdef MMWDEMO_CONFIGADCBUF_DBG
207  System_printf("Error: ADCbuf Chirp Threshold Failed with Error[%d]\n", retVal);
208 #endif
209  goto exit;
210  }
211 #endif
212 
213 exit:
214  return (retVal);
215 }

Definition: mmwdemo_adcconfig.h:87
MmwDemo_ADCBufOpen
ADCBuf_Handle MmwDemo_ADCBufOpen(void)
